detaileddescription.para: Initializes measurement point with default values and safe ranges

parameterdescription.para: Unique address for this measurement point (0-255)
Human-readable name for the measurement point

detaileddescription.para: Cleans up resources and unbinds any attached sensor

simplesect.para: int16_t Minimum temperature since last reset
int16_t Maximum temperature since last reset
int16_t Low temperature alarm threshold in °C
int16_t High temperature alarm threshold in °C
uint8_t Bit field representing active alarms
uint8_t Bit field representing error conditions

briefdescription.para: Bind a physical sensor to this measurement point.

detaileddescription.para:
sensor
Pointer to sensor instance
Links measurement point to physical sensor for direct readings

simplesect.para: Sensor* Pointer to bound sensor, nullptr if none bound

detaileddescription.para: Refreshes temperature reading and updates alarm/error status
Sets min/max to current temperature value

briefdescription.para: Update alarm status based on current temperature.

detaileddescription.para: Internal method to evaluate alarm conditions and update status bits

briefdescription.para: Logical measurement point for temperature monitoring.

detaileddescription.para: Represents a temperature measurement location with configurable alarm thresholds, min/max tracking, and optional sensor binding for direct hardware access
